description: Demand for the service had become low during the winter months, the Isle of Man government says.
title: Free Douglas Promenade shuttle bus service scrapped
title_page: Free Douglas Promenade shuttle bus service scrapped - BBC News
maintext: She added: "However, this needs to be delivered in the correct way and if the prom shuttle is not being used - assuming this is not just due to poor advertising - then the money should be redirected elsewhere."
